verses.verse: Truly my soul <WH5315> waits <WH1747> upon God <WH430>: from him comes my salvation <WH3444>.
He only is my rock <WH6697> and my salvation <WH3444>; he is my defense <WH4869>; I shall not be greatly <WH7227> moved <WH4131>.

How long will you imagine mischief <WH2050> against a man <WH376>? you shall be slain <WH7523> all of you <WH5186>: as a leaning wall <WH7023> shall you be <WH1760>, and as a tottering fence <WH1447>.

They only consult <WH3289> to cast him down <WH5080> from his excellency <WH7613>: they delight <WH7521> in lies <WH3577>: they bless <WH1288> with their mouth <WH6310>, but they curse <WH7043> inwardly <WH7130>. Selah <WH5542>.
My soul <WH5315>, wait <WH1826> you only upon God <WH430>; for my expectation is from him <WH8615>.
He only is my rock <WH6697> and my salvation <WH3444>: he is my defense <WH4869>; I shall not be moved <WH4131>.
In God <WH430> is my salvation <WH3468> and my glory <WH3519>: the rock <WH6697> of my strength <WH5797>, and my refuge <WH4268>, is in God <WH430>.
Trust <WH982> in him at all times <WH6256>; you people <WH5971>, pour out <WH8210> your heart <WH3824> before <WH6440> him <WH430>: God is a refuge <WH4268> for us <WH5542>. Selah.

Surely men <WH120> of low degree are vanity <WH1892>, and men <WH376> of high degree are a lie <WH3577>: to be laid <WH5927> in the balance <WH3976>, they are altogether <WH3162> lighter than vanity <WH1892>.
Trust <WH982> not in oppression <WH6233>, and become not vain <WH1891> in robbery <WH1498>: if riches <WH2428> increase <WH5107>, set <WH7896> not your heart upon them <WH3820>.
God <WH430> has spoken <WH1696> once <WH259>; twice <WH8147> have I heard <WH8085> this <WH2098>; that power <WH5797> belongs unto God <WH430>.
Also unto you <WH136>, O Lord, belongs mercy <WH2617>: for you render <WH7999> to every man <WH376> according to his work <WH4639>.
